description:
Hiro is Professor Ichigaya grandson. He visits the Ichigaya Laboratory in the Kalos region near Eisetsu Gym to check on Professor Ichigaya`s Chesnaught and Robon.
The day Clemont and his friends were traveling through the area, he met them at the lab and explained the situation after Professor Ichigaya`s Chesnaught mistakenly attacked them. With their help, they were able to expand upon his grandpa`s work and discover that a large rock was blocking the underwater aquifer.
name: Hiro
